method.name: Pruned Fuzzy K-Nearest Neighbors classifier

reference.ref: M. Arif, M. U. Akram, F. A. Afsar, and F. A. A. Minhas, Pruned fuzzy k-nearest neighbor classifier for beat classification, Journal of Biomedical Science and Engineering, vol. 3, 2010.

generalDescription.howWork: PFKNN starts by building a set of prototypes representing the border points of different clusters in the data and then adds to this reference set those instances which could be misclassified. The algorithm also includes a third pruning phase in which non relevant prototypes for the classification phase are discarded.

parameterSpec.param: K Value: K parameter in the k-NN voting rule.

method.example:
Problem type: Classification Method: PFKNN-C Dataset: appendicitis Test Show results: Vis-Clas-Check Parameters: Default settings
After the execution of RunKeel.jar we can see into the Vis-Clas-Check results' file the classification results for the test set:
TEST RESULTS ============ Classifier= appendicitis Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.7272727272727273 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.6363636363636364 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.8181818181818181 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.9090909090909091 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=0.8181818181818181 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.7272727272727273 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.8 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.9 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=0.9 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.17636363636363636 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.10214234112864103 Correctly classified: 0.8236363636363636 Global N/C: 0.0
TRAIN RESULTS ============ Classifier= appendicitis Summary of data, Classifiers: appendicitis Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.8526315789473684 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.8105263157894737 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.8842105263157894 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.8526315789473684 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=0.7789473684210526 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.8736842105263158 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.8333333333333334 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.84375 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=0.84375 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=0.8229166666666666 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.16036184210526316 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.02892668760521116 Correctly classified: 0.8396381578947368 Global N/C: 0.0
